glsa.title: Telegram Desktop: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Telegram, the worst of which could result in information disclosure.

background.p: Telegram is a messaging app with a focus on speed and security.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Telegram Desktop. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
